Package org.taptwo.android.widget

Interface Summary
FlowIndicator An interface which defines the contract between a ViewFlow and a FlowIndicator.
A FlowIndicator is responsible to show an visual indicator on the total views number and the current visible view.
TitleProvider A TitleProvider provides the title to display according to a view.
ViewFlow.ViewLazyInitializeListener  
ViewFlow.ViewSwitchListener Receives call backs when a new View has been scrolled to.
 

Class Summary
CircleFlowIndicator A FlowIndicator which draws circles (one for each view).
TitleFlowIndicator A TitleFlowIndicator is a FlowIndicator which displays the title of left view (if exist), the title of the current select view (centered) and the title of the right view (if exist).
ViewFlow A horizontally scrollable ViewGroup with items populated from an Adapter.
